0.text: Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing them「 5.5 − 22.5 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD)  bonus true damage every 0.25 seconds over 2.5 seconds. 」「 55 − 225 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds. 」  Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.

1.text: If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a  Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its  bonus movement speed.

2.text: Trial by Fire cannot be applied with  Parrrley nor  Powder Keg.

0.text: Active: Gangplank shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing them physical damage upon the bullet's arrival and applying  on-hit and  on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: Parrrley can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.

2.text: If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade  Cannon Barrage.

0.text: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.
Passive: Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg, up to a maximum of 3.

1.text: Active: Gangplank places a Powder Keg at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby Powder Kegs with overlapping connection radius.

2.text: Gangplank and his enemies can attack the Powder Keg with basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. Gangplank may also shoot the barrel with  Parrrley. If Gangplank scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected kegs with a 0.3-delay between explosions. If killed by an enemy, the keg is safely dismantled.

3.text: An exploding keg grants  sight of its explosion radius for 2 seconds and deals the attack's damage to all enemies within the area, plus bonus physical damage against  champions, ignoring 40% of each enemy's  armor, as well as  slowing and  revealing them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once per chain.

4.text:
Attacking a keg with Spellblade will consume the effect. If Gangplank applies it, the keg will store the damage it would have dealt and add it to the explosion damage as bonus physical damage if it is the initial detonation of a chain.
Barrel deterioration speed increases at levels 7 and 13.

0.text: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting  sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and  slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.

1.text: Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500  Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:

2.text: Death's Daughter: An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to all enemies within the impact and  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

1.marker: total magic damage withfire at will:

origin: «maximum mixed total damage withfire at will and death's daughter:

3.text: Raise Morale: The barrage grants allies  30% bonus movement speed while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.

4.text: Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires「 6 additional waves 」「 2 additional clusters 」 over its duration.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+30% attack speed
+200 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 6% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 30% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.
Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3 bonus attack damage, 3 ability haste, and 3 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THREEFOLD STRIKE: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 6% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 30% increase. Stacks decay once every 0.5 seconds after the duration ends.

Passive
